ygData.subject: {General} AOL users
ygData.msgSnippet: oops. forgot the link. hehe http://www.inklineglobal.com/download/sc/index.html Enjoy Greetings all. After talking with an AOL user today, I realized that many
ygData.messageBody:
oops. forgot the link.
hehe

http://www.inklineglobal.com/download/sc/index.html

Enjoy

Greetings all.

After talking with an AOL user today, I realized that
many of them don't know about a program that will
disable the Idle timer. The "click OK or you will be
booted" message.
Below is a web page that has one for download. If you
don't like this one, the seach string to enter into your
browser is: "aol timer".
Some of the sites this search brings up will want you to
pay for it. If you find those, keep looking. Remember
to scan for viruses and use Dr. Solomons for Trojan
detection.
Good luck.

--
I leave no signature as the email would be 4 times as
long. :P
